rdf:Description.dc:title: Students of native ancestry : enrolments, programs and support services in Alberta public post-secondary institutions 1988 enrolments, programs and support services in Alberta public post-secondary institutions.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Advanced Education. Program Coordination Branch.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton] : Program Coordination Branch, Alberta Advanced Education,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Results of a survey of post-secondary educational institutions in Alberta (universities, vocational centres, colleges and technical institutes) to determine the extent and type of enrolment, programs offered and support services provided, for native students (Indian, Metis, Inuit).
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Indians of North America
Student aid
